title: BookStore End-to-End Development
description: Built a MERN stack web app to manage book inventory, supporting full CRUD functionality, deployed on AWS EC2, ensuring a scalable infrastructure

title: Automated data upload to Bigquery
description: Engineered a scalable solution to automate data ingestion into BigQuery, optimizing workflows by 35% and enabling seamless data transfer.

title: Streaming Data Analysis using Kafka
description: Implemented a real-time data engineering pipeline to stream, process, and store stock market data, enabling efficient querying and analysis.
